headline.main: Meeting of the Commissioners of Health.; DIFFICULTY IN RELATION TO LIGHTERING AND STEVEDORING AT QUARANTINE.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Commissioners of Health met, yesterday at the City Hall--present the Mayor, Dr. GUNN, Dr, ROOKWELL, dr. MILLER Alderman McSPADON and Councilman CORNILL. The Health Officer reported the arrival of the ship Constellation, from Liverpool, with passengers, several of whom were suffering from small pox. The Board directed that they be vaccinated and the ship laid up for five days for fumigation,

docs.snippet: To the Editor of the New-York Times: A question just now of greater moment to the ladies than the fluctuations of the cotton market and the beginning of hostilities in Europe to the gentlemen. I say ladies, and mean thereby at once to crush the...

headline.main: Where are you going next Summer?

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New-York Times: A question just now of greater moment to the ladies than the fluctuations of the cotton market and the beginning of hostilities in Europe to the gentlemen. I say ladies, and mean thereby at once to crush the individual who would presumptuously suppose the gentlemen have anything to do with the matter.

headline.main: SPORTING NEWS.; PRIZE FIGHT AT ST. LOUIS--BENDIGO VICTOR AFTER EIGHTY-NINE ROUNDS. Prize Fight at St. Louis-The Billiard Match--Chess--Racing--Yachting--Cricketing.

docs.lead_paragraph: The great prize fight came off yesterday. The origin of the match we could not ascertain, but the time was set for 1 o'clock P. M., and the place the Abbey track, and after 12 M. the corner of Fifth and Green was alive with the fancy. About 12:15 a start was effected, and the "procession" moved toward the field of battle.

docs.snippet: In the case of Bradbury and Evans as, Dickens and Wills, Mr. Jesse applied on the 20th April to the Master of the Rolls for leave to serve notice of motion for the 21st, to advance the hearing of this cause on account of the depreciation which the...
docs.lead_paragraph: In the case of Bradbury and Evans as, Dickens and Wills, Mr. Jesse applied on the 20th April to the Master of the Rolls for leave to serve notice of motion for the 21st, to advance the hearing of this cause on account of the depreciation which the copyright of a work like Household Worlds would undergo if the able were celayed for any considerable time.

docs.snippet: The United States steam frigate Mississippi, on her way home from the East Indies, and the Lancaster, Wyoming and Levant, on their way out, will touch at the ports of Chill. In view of the unsettled condition of our relations with that Republic, the...
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States steam frigate Mississippi, on her way home from the East Indies, and the Lancaster, Wyoming and Levant, on their way out, will touch at the ports of Chill. In view of the unsettled condition of our relations with that Republic, the Administration has come to the conclusion that an exhibition of a portion of our naval force may have a good effect in hastening a settlement.

docs.lead_paragraph: SECOND DAY'S PROCEEDINGS. The weather on Wednesday was miserable. It rained hard and blew with a gusto, just as if it felt rained hard and blew with a gusto, just as if it felt pleasure in annoying the Anniversary-going people. docs.snippet: The Tennessee brings dates from Vera Cruz to the 8th, and from the City of Mexico to the 1st of May. The news is unimportant. General ROBLES was at Jalapa with 1,000 men. He had issued a decree forbidding the passage of the American mails.

headline.main: NEWS BY TELEGRAPH.; INTERESTING FROM MEXICO. Another Change in the Presidency Expected at the Capital--Stoppage of the American Mails--Continued Successes of the Liberals, &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Tennessee brings dates from Vera Cruz to the 8th, and from the City of Mexico to the 1st of May. The news is unimportant. General ROBLES was at Jalapa with 1,000 men. He had issued a decree forbidding the passage of the American mails.

docs.snippet: Juveniie Reformatory convention--Interesting Debates on the Methods of Treating and Preventing Juvenile Crime. A direle day than Tuesday for a Convention to open was soidom seen. In the morning clouds of dust swept through the dirty streets, while...
docs.lead_paragraph: Juveniie Reformatory convention--Interesting Debates on the Methods of Treating and Preventing Juvenile Crime. A direle day than Tuesday for a Convention to open was soidom seen. In the morning clouds of dust swept through the dirty streets, while one thick, black, normal cloud canopied the City. Instead of the August weather of the day proceding, it was back again in March. At 2o'clock it began to rain,
